author: Simon Difford
description: An intriguing combination for folk who want their Daiquiris served 'fresh'.
name: Peppermint Vanilla Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
